title: libalf: The Automata Learning Framework.
abstract: This paper presents libalf, a comprehensive, open-source library for learning formal languages libalf covers various well-known learning techniques for finite automata (e.g Angluin's L*, Biermann, RPNI etc.) as well as novel learning algorithms (such as for NFA and visibly one-counter automata) libalf is flexible and allows facilely interchanging learning algorithms and combining domain-specific features in a plug-and-play fashion Its modular design and C++ implementation make it a suitable platform for adding and engineering further learning algorithms for new target models (e.g., Buchi automata).
